h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Old Ginseng Guai
content: Even with his slow speed, he's capable of using his stumbling lurches to lunge at you, so be ready for him to attack with an elbow drop with surprising reach, or a flailing kick that sends him staggering toward you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Towers of Karma' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Old Ginseng Guai'.
The content is as follows:
Even with his slow speed, he's capable of using his stumbling lurches to lunge at you, so be ready for him to attack with an elbow drop with surprising reach, or a flailing kick that sends him staggering toward you.
